tool_description: Analyzes visual content quality including resolution, file size, compression artifacts, and technical specifications to ensure optimal social media performance.

asset_url.description: URL or path to the visual asset (image or video)

target_platform.description: Target platform: facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, youtube, tiktok, pinterest

content_type.description: Content type: post, story, cover, profile, thumbnail, reel, video

error_messages: Asset not accessible: Ensure asset_url points to a valid image or video file.
Invalid platform: Use one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, youtube, tiktok, pinterest].
Invalid content type: Use one of [post, story, cover, profile, thumbnail, reel, video].
Unsupported file format: Use common formats (JPG, PNG, GIF, MP4, MOV, WebP).
usage: Provide asset_url, target_platform, and content_type. The tool analyzes technical quality and provides optimization recommendations.

compression_quality.description: Assessment of compression artifacts: excellent, good, fair, poor
